name: nextcloud-forms
description: Nextcloud Forms is a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Forms. It allows creating custom forms, sharing links, and collecting responses, fully integrated into self-hosted Nextcloud.
features: Form builder: Create custom forms with multiple question types including text, multiple choice, and dropdowns.
Anonymous responses: Collect submissions without requiring user authentication for public surveys.
Response collection: Gather and organize form submissions with timestamps and user information.
Export results: Download responses as CSV or Excel files for analysis and reporting.
Question logic: Show or hide questions based on previous answers for dynamic forms.
Required fields: Mark questions as mandatory to ensure complete submissions.
Shareable links: Generate public URLs for forms that can be shared via email or social media.
Response limits: Set submission deadlines or maximum response counts to close forms automatically.
Privacy-focused: All data stays on your Nextcloud server with no third-party tracking.
Nextcloud integration: Access forms directly from Nextcloud interface with unified user management.
Real-time updates: View new responses as they arrive without refreshing the page.
Form templates: Save and reuse form structures for recurring surveys or feedback collection.
